class_p_char_149_scave.description: A silver coin. Maybe you can use it to decide something important.
class_p_char_149_scave.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Scavenger.

class_p_char_290_vigna.name: Vigna's Kernel Token
class_p_char_290_vigna.description: An electric guitar for daily practice. A request to take it onto the battlefield was denied.
class_p_char_290_vigna.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vigna.

class_p_char_130_doberm.name: Dobermann's Kernel Token
class_p_char_130_doberm.description: A red pamphlet. It records a tough battle.
class_p_char_130_doberm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dobermann.

class_p_char_289_gyuki.name: Matoimaru's Kernel Token

class_p_char_349_chiave.name: Chiave's Kernel Token

class_p_char_349_chiave.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chiave.

class_p_char_218_cuttle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Andreana.

class_p_char_365_aprl.description: An album including the song 'April,' still freshly packaged and tied up in a lovely ribbon.
class_p_char_365_aprl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of April.

class_p_char_346_aosta.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aosta.

class_p_char_478_kirara.name: Kirara's Kernel Token
class_p_char_478_kirara.description: [Shinobi Ex Machina 2] Collector's Edition. The launch collector's edition of a classic Higashi game. She's dying to share all her favorites with you.
class_p_char_478_kirara.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kirara.

class_p_char_103_angel.name: Exusiai's Kernel Token
class_p_char_103_angel.description: A Best Boss medal. Collect five of these to exchange for a Super Boss medal.
class_p_char_103_angel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Exusiai.

class_p_char_112_siege.name: Siege's Kernel Token
class_p_char_112_siege.description: A large, hard rivet. Made by workers in Londinium, it will return to its homeland in the end.
class_p_char_112_siege.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Siege.

class_p_char_134_ifrit.name: Ifrit's Kernel Token
class_p_char_134_ifrit.description: A long novel telling a legendary story. It is badly burned and you can only barely make out the words.
class_p_char_134_ifrit.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ifrit.

class_p_char_180_amgoat.name: Eyjafjalla's Kernel Token
class_p_char_180_amgoat.description: A small pair of scissors. The handle is carefully wrapped in heat-resistant cloth.
class_p_char_180_amgoat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eyjafjalla.

class_p_char_291_aglina.name: Angelina's Kernel Token
class_p_char_291_aglina.description: A lime flavored lip balm. The wind in the wilds is as dry as the nights in the city.
class_p_char_291_aglina.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Angelina.

class_p_char_147_shining.name: Shining's Kernel Token
class_p_char_147_shining.description: A white pendant. It looks normal, but it cannot be stained by dust.
class_p_char_147_shining.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shining.

class_p_char_179_cgbird.name: Nightingale's Kernel Token
class_p_char_179_cgbird.description: A box of messy puzzles. The real problem is many pieces are missing.
class_p_char_179_cgbird.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightingale.

class_p_char_136_hsguma.name: Hoshiguma's Kernel Token
class_p_char_136_hsguma.description: An old manga. It tells the story of an unknown monster becoming a hero with the help of his friends.
class_p_char_136_hsguma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hoshiguma.

class_p_char_202_demkni.name: Saria's Kernel Token
class_p_char_202_demkni.description: Several security cooperation contracts. Some of them already have a gray calcareous stamp on them.
class_p_char_202_demkni.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saria.

class_p_char_172_svrash.name: SilverAsh's Kernel Token
class_p_char_172_svrash.description: One of only a few extant Originium Ice crystals that represent sincerity. It will never melt.
class_p_char_172_svrash.usage: Used to improve the Potential of SilverAsh.

class_p_char_263_skadi.name: Skadi's Kernel Token
class_p_char_263_skadi.description: A song written in her mother tongue. Although you can't understand a word of it, she IS going to teach it to you.
class_p_char_263_skadi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi.

class_p_char_010_chen.name: Ch'en's Kernel Token
class_p_char_010_chen.description: This thing has been sealed for a long time. She didn't forget it. It's just that she can't bear to touch that rusty point again. Perhaps someday it will burn again.
class_p_char_010_chen.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en.

class_p_char_340_shwaz.name: Schwarz's Kernel Token
class_p_char_340_shwaz.description: A crossbow. Well maintained and easy to use. But the tiny scratches and dents on it provide some insight into all the killing it has done.
class_p_char_340_shwaz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Schwarz.

class_p_char_188_helage.name: Hellagur's Kernel Token
class_p_char_188_helage.description: A thick thread-bound book that will never be lent to anyone else. Its pages describe the decades of war in Ursus, and the dried ink carries a long history of suffering.
class_p_char_188_helage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hellagur.

class_p_char_248_mgllan.name: Magallan's Kernel Token
class_p_char_248_mgllan.description: A fossilized branch covered in snow. The mighty tree this came from once spread its roots throughout the land, but this branch is all that remains to tell its story.
class_p_char_248_mgllan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Magallan.

class_p_char_213_mostma.name: Mostima's Kernel Token
class_p_char_213_mostma.description: It's her blunderbuss. She doesn't need it anymore.
class_p_char_213_mostma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mostima.

class_p_char_017_huang.name: Blaze's Kernel Token
class_p_char_017_huang.description: A glass bottle with hard-to-discern contents inside. After being shaken a few times, the bottle heats up, making it perfect for keeping one's hands warm in the winter.
class_p_char_017_huang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blaze.

class_p_char_225_haak.name: Aak's Kernel Token
class_p_char_225_haak.description: A bottle filled with 6 different-colored pills. No instructions are provided.
class_p_char_225_haak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aak.

class_p_char_2013_cerber.name: Ceobe's Kernel Token
class_p_char_2013_cerber.description: An origami knife that took a long time to fold. It's crooked, full of extra creases, and rough around the edges. Wonder if the recipient will like it?
class_p_char_2013_cerber.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceobe.

class_p_char_222_bpipe.name: Bagpipe's Kernel Token
class_p_char_222_bpipe.description: A handful of quinoa. The land breeds life, and life returns to feed the land.
class_p_char_222_bpipe.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bagpipe.

class_p_char_250_phatom.name: Phantom's Kernel Token
class_p_char_250_phatom.description: An old music score. The notes upon the manuscript have long been blurred by the passage of time.
class_p_char_250_phatom.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Phantom.

class_p_char_400_weedy.name: Weedy's Kernel Token
class_p_char_400_weedy.description: A sheaf of Bionic Seadragon blueprints. Crammed with helpful annotations from the designer herself, who's written 'even a beckbeast could make one from scratch with this.' And she's probably right.
class_p_char_400_weedy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Weedy.

class_p_char_197_poca.name: Rosa's Kernel Token
class_p_char_197_poca.description: A paper cutter. She solemnly handed it to you, but you're not sure why.
class_p_char_197_poca.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosa.

class_p_char_358_lisa.name: Suzuran's Kernel Token
class_p_char_358_lisa.description: A handful of lily-of-the-valley flowers. When Lisa was asked what she had in mind for her code name, she happened to have her arms around a pot filled with these flowers.
class_p_char_358_lisa.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Suzuran.

class_p_char_293_thorns.name: Thorns's Kernel Token
class_p_char_293_thorns.description: A small vial of medicinal fluid, a reminder of some of his earliest work; Danger, use with caution.
class_p_char_293_thorns.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Thorns.

class_p_char_416_zumama.name: Eunectes's Kernel Token
class_p_char_416_zumama.description: A wrench that seems to been used for a long time. Useful for mechanical manufacturing, or self-defense in a pinch.
class_p_char_416_zumama.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eunectes.

class_p_char_350_surtr.name: Surtr's Kernel Token
class_p_char_350_surtr.description: A photocopied document filled with place names, several of which have been crossed out in red. If you have time, you can help scout these locations.
class_p_char_350_surtr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Surtr.

class_p_char_423_blemsh.name: Blemishine's Kernel Token
class_p_char_423_blemsh.description: A book of a knight's tale; an absurd legend, legendary absurdity.
class_p_char_423_blemsh.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blemishine.

class_p_char_311_mudrok.name: Mudrock's Kernel Token
class_p_char_311_mudrok.description: A tiny little rock sculpture. It looks like it's 'gazing' at you inquisitively.
class_p_char_311_mudrok.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mudrock.

class_p_char_264_f12yin.name: Mountain's Kernel Token
class_p_char_264_f12yin.description: A fine grape wine, all wrapped up. Its place of origin appears to be a very famed Columbian winery; we don't know by what means he obtained it.
class_p_char_264_f12yin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mountain.

class_p_char_332_archet.name: Archetto's Kernel Token
class_p_char_332_archet.description: A Monastery limited commemoration badge. Meant to be bought, but just call this one a gift of friendship!
class_p_char_332_archet.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Archetto.

class_p_char_362_saga.name: Saga's Kernel Token
class_p_char_362_saga.description: A wooden fish she carved by herself. When on edge, just chant the sutras with her.
class_p_char_362_saga.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saga.

class_p_char_472_pasngr.name: Passenger's Kernel Token
class_p_char_472_pasngr.description: An ancient Sargon gold coin. Sent to and fro by the long hands of fate, it now belongs to you.
class_p_char_472_pasngr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Passenger.

class_p_char_003_kalts.name: Kal'tsit's Kernel Token
class_p_char_003_kalts.description: An unusual pocket watch, of a format never before seen in any country. Engraved on it are four dates across as many years, as well as a few crooked letters.
class_p_char_003_kalts.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kal'tsit.

class_p_char_426_billro.name: Carnelian's Kernel Token
class_p_char_426_billro.description: A small souvenir collected by travelers. She's spoken of the place she bought this souvenir having such good views, and that next time, she'll take you with her to see them.
class_p_char_426_billro.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Carnelian.

class_p_char_485_pallas.name: Pallas's Kernel Token
class_p_char_485_pallas.description: A Minos hero's epic. 'The hero came from the commoners, and returned to amongst the commoners.' This line, at the head of the poem, has been circled.
class_p_char_485_pallas.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pallas.

voucher_full_ceylon.name: Ceylon's Personal Letter
voucher_full_ceylon.description: The letter makes mention of progress on a near-future Originium academic course, hopes for the new city of Siesta, and care for how Schwarz is doing.
voucher_full_ceylon.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Ceylon to Max Potential.

voucher_full_grani.name: Grani's Personal Letter
voucher_full_grani.description: The letter only contains a few simple well-wishes—its writer, likely right at the Doctor's side by the time the letter lands on the desk.
voucher_full_grani.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Grani to Max Potential.

voucher_full_flameb.name: Flamebringer's Personal Letter
voucher_full_flameb.description: A letter that discusses floriculture, the life philosophy derived from it, and the sender's pointed feelings about the Doctor.
voucher_full_flameb.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Flamebringer to Max Potential.

voucher_full_bison.name: Bison's Personal Letter
voucher_full_bison.description: The letter talks about his own situation, his impressions of the Penguin Logistics employees he's come into contact with, and his outlook on the future.
voucher_full_bison.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Bison to Max Potential.

voucher_full_snsant.name: Snowsant's Personal Letter
voucher_full_snsant.description: The letter writes of self-researched projects' various details, applications for funding, as well as heartfelt thanks to the Doctor.
voucher_full_snsant.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Snowsant to Max Potential.

voucher_full_sidero.name: Sideroca's Personal Letter
voucher_full_sidero.description: The letter contains an everyday greeting, a recipe under development, an exhortation to work out, and overflowing ambition.
voucher_full_sidero.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Sideroca to Max Potential.

voucher_full_absin.name: Absinthe's Personal Letter
voucher_full_absin.description: The letter talks of how her acclimation to Rhodes Island is going, and of the sense she's making of the chaos in Ursus and the way she sees it.
voucher_full_absin.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Absinthe to Max Potential.

voucher_full_folnic.name: Folinic's Personal Letter
voucher_full_folnic.description: The letter briefly goes into the results of her research and the progress of her mission; a significant majority of the rest is simply her concerns and repeated urgings, enough to give you a minor headache.
voucher_full_folnic.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Folinic to Max Potential.

voucher_full_mint.name: Mint's Personal Letter
voucher_full_mint.description: The letter mentions how she has acclimated to Rhodes Island, the books she has been reading of late, as well as the results of her geological research.
voucher_full_mint.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Mint to Max Potential.

voucher_full_tomimi.name: Tomimi's Personal Letter
voucher_full_tomimi.description: The letter writes of fashion, Gavial, and her hoarded treasures, not to mention Gavial.
voucher_full_tomimi.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Tomimi to Max Potential.

voucher_full_sophia.name: Whislash's Personal Letter
voucher_full_sophia.description: The letter writes colorfully of her leisure time, as well as her few little gripes with the Operator training process. Attached is a signed check with no monetary amount filled in.
voucher_full_sophia.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Whislash to Max Potential.

voucher_full_bena.name: Bena's Personal Letter
voucher_full_bena.description: The letter makes mention of her intimate conversations with Annie, as well as a few snippets of verse whose significance is not expounded on.
voucher_full_bena.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Bena to Max Potential.

voucher_full_robin.name: Robin's Personal Letter
voucher_full_robin.description: The letter writes of her thoughts on trust and betrayal, as well as some small little changes in her father.
voucher_full_robin.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Robin to Max Potential.

voucher_full_lava2.name: Lava the Purgatory's Personal Letter
voucher_full_lava2.description: The letter writes of her recent results in studying Originium Arts in-depth, with a few postscripts at the end to complain of her sister.
voucher_full_lava2.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Lava the Purgatory to Max Potential.

voucher_full_zebra.name: Heavyrain's Personal Letter
voucher_full_zebra.description: The letter mentions a few comic books that she had just completed, as well as the friends she met because of them.
voucher_full_zebra.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Heavyrain to Max Potential.

voucher_full_glady.name: Gladiia's Personal Letter
voucher_full_glady.description: The letter writes of her hidden worries for Ægir and the ocean, as well as preliminary plans for an alliance with all the nations of the land.
voucher_full_glady.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Gladiia to Max Potential.

voucher_full_takila.name: Tequila's Personal Letter
voucher_full_takila.description: The letter writes of a number of ordinary happenings on his return to Dossoles, as well as of the few bottles of vintage he'll be bringing back aboard.
voucher_full_takila.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Tequila to Max Potential.

voucher_full_wildmn.name: Wild Mane's Personal Letter
voucher_full_wildmn.description: The letter writes of her daily training with the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, as well as her plans for future upgrades.
voucher_full_wildmn.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Wild Mane to Max Potential.

voucher_full_kjera.name: Kjera's Personal Letter
voucher_full_kjera.description: The letter mentions her experiences writing tourism slogans for Kjerag, and her perplexity at the lukewarm reception they received from the public.
voucher_full_kjera.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Kjera to Max Potential.

voucher_full_kroos2.name: Kroos the Keen Glint's Personal Letter
voucher_full_kroos2.description: The letter writes of her experiences touring Shangshu, as well as her newly informed opinions on its signature dishes.
voucher_full_kroos2.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Kroos the Keen Glint to Max Potential.

voucher_full_forcer.name: Enforcer's Personal Letter
voucher_full_forcer.description: The letter writes of the sights and sounds on his journey to Kazdel, as well as Cecelia's fragrant homemade lattes.
voucher_full_forcer.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Enforcer to Max Potential.

voucher_full_lumen.name: Lumen's Personal Letter
voucher_full_lumen.description: The letter writes of his busy yet fulfilling work at the Inquisition, as well as of the sunrise in Gran Faro.
voucher_full_lumen.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Lumen to Max Potential.

voucher_full_pianst.name: Czerny's Personal Letter
voucher_full_pianst.description: The letter mentions his life in The Afterglow, and his recent musical inspirations.
voucher_full_pianst.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Czerny to Max Potential.

voucher_full_halo.name: Astgenne's Personal Letter
voucher_full_halo.description: The letter mentions her recent research projects, and a breakfast cafe in Trimounts that both she and her sister like very much.
voucher_full_halo.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Astgenne to Max Potential.

voucher_full_malist.name: Minimalist's Personal Letter
voucher_full_malist.description: The letter mentions his newest Aquapit design, and some friendly recommendations for Rhodes Island's internal furnishing.
voucher_full_malist.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Minimalist to Max Potential.

voucher_full_puzzle.name: Puzzle's Personal Letter
voucher_full_puzzle.description: The letter mentions his peaceful life before he became a spy, and the foggy sights of Londinium he never tires of.
voucher_full_puzzle.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Puzzle to Max Potential.

voucher_full_bdhkgt.name: Jieyun's Personal Letter
voucher_full_bdhkgt.description: The letter mentions all the weird and wonderful things she has seen between leaving her tribe and joining Rhodes Island, and many questions she has about life aboard the landship.
voucher_full_bdhkgt.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Jieyun to Max Potential.

uni_set_guitar.name: Heart of Surging Flame Furniture Pack
uni_set_guitar.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_guitar.usage: Obtain all 'Rhodes Island Modern Music Rehearsal Room' furniture exclusive to the Heart of Surging Flame event not yet acquired.

uni_set_pizza.name: Grani and the Knights' Treasure Furniture Pack
uni_set_pizza.description: As long as you hand the order over to Closure, she'll help you get your hands on any furniture you don't already own. Don't worry, she's not losing out.
uni_set_pizza.usage: Obtain all 'Express Chain Pizzeria' furniture exclusive to the Grani and the Knights' Treasure event not yet acquired.

uni_set_penguin.name: Code of Brawl Furniture Pack
uni_set_penguin.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_penguin.usage: Obtain all 'Penguin Logistics Safehouse' furniture exclusive to the Code of Brawl event not yet acquired.

uni_set_concertHall.name: Lingering Echoes Furniture Pack
uni_set_concertHall.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_concertHall.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Lingering Echoes event not yet acquired.

uni_set_rhineLab.name: Dorothy's Vision Furniture Pack
uni_set_rhineLab.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_rhineLab.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Dorothy's Vision event not yet acquired.

uni_set_idealCity.name: Ideal City Furniture Pack
uni_set_idealCity.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_idealCity.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Ideal City: Endless Carnival event not yet acquired.

uni_set_countryside.name: What the Firelight Casts Furniture Pack
uni_set_countryside.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_countryside.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the What the Firelight Casts event not yet acquired.

uni_set_martialClub.name: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow Furniture Pack
uni_set_martialClub.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_martialClub.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow event not yet acquired.

ap_item_amiya.name: Amiya's Grilled Flavor Biscuit
ap_item_amiya.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
ap_item_amiya.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_chen.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
ap_item_chen.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_slchan.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
ap_item_slchan.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_SEC_60.name: Salted Egg Yolk Flavor Chocolate
ap_item_SEC_60.description: I'm not sure when it first started, but ever since that time, the salted egg yolk-flavored food craze has swept the world. It's as if everywhere I look is salted egg yolk. I try to my avert my eyes, but nothing but salted egg yolk awaits me. All of this makes me... unable to refuse.
ap_item_SEC_60.usage: Edible product used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_CaH_200.name: Burger Set for Two
ap_item_CaH_200.description: A burger meal for two bought at a chain fast food restaurant popular in many cities. The taste and size of the burgers is perfect. It's just that the set only includes 1 cup of Dr. Cinnamon, which may lead to the ice melting into the drink as the two diners each try to let the other enjoy it.
ap_item_CaH_200.usage: Edible product used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

CRISIS_RUNE_COIN.name: Operation Agreement
CRISIS_RUNE_COIN.description: The elimination of chaos does not necessarily ensure the establishment of order. 'Natural disasters turn into man-made disasters,' but the Contingency Contract system at least provides you with a solution.
CRISIS_RUNE_COIN.usage: A symbol of cooperation. Can be used to unlock additional content in Contingency Contract.

1stact.name: Bounty Coin
1stact.description: A fortune coin used as an amulet by most bounty hunters. When these coins appear, it means their luck has run out.
1stact.usage: Can be exchanged for all kinds of supplies.

act1d0_token_gold_rep_1.name: Bounty Coin
act1d0_token_gold_rep_1.description: A fortune coin used as an amulet by most bounty hunters. When these coins appear, it means their luck has run out.
act1d0_token_gold_rep_1.usage: Can be exchanged for all kinds of supplies.

token_Wristband.name: Obsidian Festival Bracelet
token_Wristband.description: The bracelets are costly to make, so we are not gonna let them just get thrown away!
token_Wristband.usage: Recyclable entry identification bracelet for the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to redeem rewards.
token_Wristband.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

et_ObsidianPass.name: Obsidian Festival Ticket
et_ObsidianPass.description: A through ticket system has been implemented across the various venues at this Obsidian Festival, which means tickets are required for most events. So please make good use of the tickets you have!
et_ObsidianPass.usage: A ticket to the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to enter special stages.

token_Obsidian.name: Siesta Obsidian
token_Obsidian.description: Just collect them regardless of what they can do. Surely the marketing department will find some use for them.
token_Obsidian.usage: Obsidian crystal mined from Siesta. Can be used to redeem rewards.

token_ObsidianCoin.name: Obsidian Festival Token
token_ObsidianCoin.description: The demand from Obsidian Festival participants is so exceedingly high that they have yet to be met even after repeated reward restocking. Unfortunately, stopping the raffle at this time would mean triggering a riot, so the hosts have to keep the raffle going.
token_ObsidianCoin.usage: Official token for the Obsidian Festival raffle event. Can be used to draw rewards.

clue_Heavymetal_1.name: Heavy Metal Trend 1
clue_Heavymetal_1.description: It's all about the heavy metal bands at the Obsidian Festival.
clue_Heavymetal_1.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_2.name: Heavy Metal Trend 2
clue_Heavymetal_2.description: They said an expensive enough guitar would go un-smashed.
clue_Heavymetal_2.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_3.name: Heavy Metal Trend 3
clue_Heavymetal_3.description: In fact, most people are just coming along for the ride, and going too fast only makes them panic.
clue_Heavymetal_3.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_4.name: Heavy Metal Trend 4
clue_Heavymetal_4.description: Envy is a very common motif. And the word is short.
clue_Heavymetal_4.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_5.name: Heavy Metal Trend 5
clue_Heavymetal_5.description: Costuming really has nothing to do with the speed of the performance.
clue_Heavymetal_5.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_1.name: EDM Trend 1
clue_EDM_1.description: Seems to be comments from some electronic music fans.
clue_EDM_1.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_2.name: EDM Trend 2
clue_EDM_2.description: Remember to stay hydrated on the dance floor.
clue_EDM_2.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_3.name: EDM Trend 3
clue_EDM_3.description: Electronic music fans are a breed of their own.
clue_EDM_3.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_4.name: EDM Trend 4
clue_EDM_4.description: DJs start composing their own songs when they are unsatisfied with the existing ones.
clue_EDM_4.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_5.name: EDM Trend 5
clue_EDM_5.description: Even DJs struggle to get visas to certain countries. Or rather they're even less likely to get approved.
clue_EDM_5.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_1.name: Rap Trend 1
clue_Rap_1.description: Yo, bro, what's up? Too hard to rhyme?
clue_Rap_1.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_2.name: Rap Trend 2
clue_Rap_2.description: Don't take your eyes off a man with a gun. Rapping angels are a lot of fun.
clue_Rap_2.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_3.name: Rap Trend 3
clue_Rap_3.description: Fight your battles with words, not with blades. Criminal activity won't be tolerated in Siesta.
clue_Rap_3.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_4.name: Rap Trend 4
clue_Rap_4.description: A bunch of people always get arrested at the Obsidian Festival and end up permanently denied entry. Too bad for them.
clue_Rap_4.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_5.name: Rap Trend 5
clue_Rap_5.description: Do you know how many rappers are there in Columbia?
clue_Rap_5.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

act4d0_intelligencepoint.name: Valid Intelligence Unit
act4d0_intelligencepoint.description: Whether it's providing mission feedback, collecting spoils, analyzing materials, facilitating communications, or streamlining operations, Rhodes Island's efficient intelligence system continues to collect complex data from a vast array of actions and operations in order to provide the best course of action. For those unfamiliar to the mechanisms of this black box, just looking at the results will suffice.
act4d0_intelligencepoint.usage: A basic unit of the Rhodes Island Intelligence Processing System, used to advance intel-gathering efforts.

act5d0_point_medal.name: Top Tier Penguin Medal
act5d0_point_medal.description: A luxurious, but completely meaningless, golden medal created by the most esteemed goldsmiths in Lungmen. You'll be hard pressed to find anything more limited than this in all of Terra. It's clearly a cup, but still called a medal, and it symbolizes the highest praise of the Emperor. Each sip is worth a thousand bucks, but don't use it to make hot coffee!
act5d0_point_medal.usage: Collecting medals issued by Emperor himself? Probably a good idea.

act5d0_point_medal_rep_1.name: Top Tier Penguin Medal
act5d0_point_medal_rep_1.description: A luxurious, but completely meaningless, golden medal created by the most esteemed goldsmiths in Lungmen. You'll be hard pressed to find anything more limited than this in all of Terra. It's clearly a cup, but still called a medal, and it symbolizes the highest praise of the Emperor. Each sip is worth a thousand bucks, but don't use it to make hot coffee!
act5d0_point_medal_rep_1.usage: Collecting medals issued by Emperor himself? Probably a good idea.

act5d1_point_conbounty.name: Contract Bounty
act5d1_point_conbounty.description: The ruthless but effective bounty mechanism is the only way to ensure the normal operations of the Contingency Contract system.
act5d1_point_conbounty.usage: Rewards earned after completing a contract. Can be used to redeem supplies.

act5d1_point_opagrt.name: Operation Agreement
act5d1_point_opagrt.description: The elimination of chaos does not necessarily ensure the establishment of order. 'Natural disasters turn into man-made disasters,' but the Contingency Contract system at least provides you with a solution.
act5d1_point_opagrt.usage: A symbol of cooperation. Can be used to unlock additional content in Contingency Contract.

act6d5_point_firecracker.name: Quantum Firecracker
act6d5_point_firecracker.description: A traditional explosive device that derives its meaning from its purpose. If an explosive goes off in a forest and no one is around to hear it, did an explosive really go off at all?
act6d5_point_firecracker.usage: The wonderful paraphernalia collected during the festival can be exchanged for great rewards.

act6d8_point_token.name: Lantern Festival Treasure
act6d8_point_token.description: A currency that is only good in the here-and-now. The wonderful thing about tradition is that some things that appear lost to time will suddenly wake up at the most unexpected of days.
act6d8_point_token.usage: The paraphernalia collected during the New Year can be exchanged for great rewards.
act6d8_point_token.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

act7d5_point_coupon.name: Canteen Soup Ticket
act7d5_point_coupon.description: The Rhodes Island Logistics Departmen issued this meal voucher during an event as an incentive to complete a series of missions. During the trial period, it will be distributed according to the number of missions completed or to operation results.
act7d5_point_coupon.usage: A food voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Logistics Department, redeemable at the cafeteria for a limited time for a variety of special meals.

act9d0_token_dogTag.name: Anonymous Tags
act9d0_token_dogTag.description: The major problem facing Kazdel's metalworking industries is that because metallic resources are mostly used for killing soldiers instead of remembering them, the rate of soldier deaths almost outpaces the ability to produce identification tags for them. This tragic scarcity has created a ripe market for perverse collectors.
act9d0_token_dogTag.usage: These ID tags are generally intact, with only part of the text worn out. The Scar Market looks favorably upon this good fortune.
act9d0_token_dogTag.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act9d0_token_dogTag_rep_1.name: Anonymous Tags
act9d0_token_dogTag_rep_1.description: The major problem facing Kazdel's metalworking industries is that because metallic resources are mostly used for killing soldiers instead of remembering them, the rate of soldier deaths almost outpaces the ability to produce identification tags for them. This tragic scarcity has created a ripe market for perverse collectors.
act9d0_token_dogTag_rep_1.usage: These ID tags are generally intact, with only part of the text worn out. The Scar Market looks favorably upon this good fortune.
act9d0_token_dogTag_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act9d4_point_token.name: Guerilla Squad Member Badge
act9d4_point_token.usage: These guerilla badges from the heart of Chernobog can be given to specific individuals in exchange for some rewards.
act9d4_point_token.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

act10d5_token_biscuit.name: Best-selling Peterheim Cookies
act10d5_token_biscuit.description:
Snack bags usually are not a very effective way to preserve the integrity of their contents, so it's hard to find one with a complete cookie inside.
Though a bit fragmented, the overall appearance is cute enough, and the flavor is still uncompromised.
act10d5_token_biscuit.usage: Sold exclusively at Peterheim Middle School and all the rage among students, can be exchanged for various supplies.

act11d0_token_currency.name: Aristocrat's Antique Aureus
act11d0_token_currency.description: The original owners of these antique coin have long departed from this remote land. However, the descendants of these decorated nobles still demanded Wolumonde's respect, and thus they passed into law the ability to circulate these coins for the purpose of satisfying their vanity.
act11d0_token_currency.usage: An antique currency that is still in circulation in Wolumonde; Can be used to exchange for rewards at the August Fair.

act11d0_token_currency_rep_1.name: Aristocrat's Antique Aureus
act11d0_token_currency_rep_1.description: The original owners of these antique coin have long departed from this remote land. However, the descendants of these decorated nobles still demanded Wolumonde's respect, and thus they passed into law the ability to circulate these coins for the purpose of satisfying their vanity.
act11d0_token_currency_rep_1.usage: An antique currency that is still in circulation in Wolumonde; Can be used to exchange for rewards at the August Fair.

act11d0_token_warrant.name: Wolumonde Search Warrant
act11d0_token_warrant.description: Grip this document within your hands as if the distinctive laws of Leithanien never wavered. But, this illusion has long been shattered by the tragedy unfolding before your eyes in Wolumonde - delve deep into the mines, woods, and unclaimed vales, and bring justice to the perpetrators.
act11d0_token_warrant.usage: A warrant issued by Wolumonde's Gendarmerie, authorizing entry into occupied zones to hunt down ruffians who fled amidst the chaos.

act12d0_token_components.name: Mechanical Parts
act12d0_token_components.description: Originally seen only in Zumama's tribe, these eventually scattered throughout various places in the rainforests and wilds. Each one seems imaginative to the point of defying the laws of physics, but falls short of the industrial standards of any country.
act12d0_token_components.usage: Widely-used mechanical parts in Zumama's tribe, can be exchanged for various supplies.

act12d0_token_components_rep_1.name: Mechanical Parts
act12d0_token_components_rep_1.description: Originally seen only in Zumama's tribe, these eventually scattered throughout various places in the rainforests and wilds. Each one seems imaginative to the point of defying the laws of physics, but falls short of the industrial standards of any country.
act12d0_token_components_rep_1.usage: Widely-used mechanical parts in Zumama's tribe, can be exchanged for various supplies.

act12d6_token_mushroom.name: Magnificent Mushroom
act12d6_token_mushroom.description: Allows you to blur the boundary between fact and fiction, seeing things that you could not see before. Of course, this is the culprit behind your adventures.
act12d6_token_mushroom.usage: These psychadelic-looking mushrooms exuding brilliant colors can enhance the performance of the Limbic System.

act12d6_token_pancake.name: Delicious Honey Biscuit
act12d6_token_pancake.description: Ceobe's favorite food. She is willing to part with anything in exchange for these.
act12d6_token_pancake.usage: A traditional Minosian food made from starch and fructose. Used to obtain rewards from the Honey Biscuit Castle.

act13d0_token_dial.name: Discarded Clock Dial
act13d0_token_dial.description: A once treasured clock, now reduced to nothing more than a broken dial with some small value only to collectors. You find things like this in abandoned houses. A clock silently keeping the time can be priceless, or worthless. The hour hand on the dial is stuck in place, vainly trying to turn.
act13d0_token_dial.usage: An old, broken piece of a clock that can be exchanged for supplies at the weekend yard sale. Someone will want it.

act13d5_token_securities.name: Mieszko Sports Securities
act13d5_token_securities.description: A couple blond Fortes are selling gold pieces of paper at three times the stated price. This voucher can be used to buy aid packages for competition knights in the arena, or as a bankroll to bet on, but be prepared to pay more than the number printed on it. A piece of paper, a huge sum, a knight's life of honor and shame.
act13d5_token_securities.usage: A new securitized holding launched by the Mieszko Group that allows you to buy souvenirs at a Kazimierz duty free shop.
act13d5_token_securities.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act13d5_token_securities_rep_1.name: Mieszko Sports Securities
act13d5_token_securities_rep_1.description: A couple blond Fortes are selling gold pieces of paper at three times the stated price. This voucher can be used to buy aid packages for competition knights in the arena, or as a bankroll to bet on, but be prepared to pay more than the number printed on it. A piece of paper, a huge sum, a knight's life of honor and shame.
act13d5_token_securities_rep_1.usage: A new securitized holding launched by the Mieszko Group that allows you to buy souvenirs at a Kazimierz duty free shop.
act13d5_token_securities_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act15d0_token_ironSheet.name: Factory Steel
act15d0_token_ironSheet.description: You can make them during factory work hours, but it's no easy thing to sneak them off. They work as weapons as well as currency, and act as one measure of status in the prison.
act15d0_token_ironSheet.usage: A currency universally recognized amongst the prisoners. Can be used through secret channels to obtain what you want.
act15d0_token_ironSheet.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act15d0_token_ironSheet_rep_1.name: Factory Steel
act15d0_token_ironSheet_rep_1.description: You can make them during factory work hours, but it's no easy thing to sneak them off. They work as weapons as well as currency, and act as one measure of status in the prison.
act15d0_token_ironSheet_rep_1.usage: A currency universally recognized amongst the prisoners. Can be used through secret channels to obtain what you want.
act15d0_token_ironSheet_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act15d5_token_postcard.name: Wondrous Postcard
act15d5_token_postcard.description: Landscape postcards independently published by the people all over, known for their distinct and bold framing, all using photos chosen from personal submissions, with some small fame among a subset of collectors. Different stories take root in different lands, and the scenery is always there to tell without a word.
act15d5_token_postcard.usage: Postcards printed with unique landscapes from every part, allowing a taste of all their sceneries without having to set foot outside. Can be used to exchange for goods with the staff of branch offices everywhere.

act16d5_token_inker.name: Dusk Inkstick
act16d5_token_inker.description: On its front, 'starshrouded snow' is engraved in characters from ancient times. Just the talent to create these inksticks can be called rare. Dusk very rarely uses normal inksticks. If she's out of options, employing one to depict one and retrieving one fresh isn't impossible either.
act16d5_token_inker.usage: Dusk's handmade inkstick. Nobody knows how they're made. Perhaps you can make use of them to ask her about a few things.
act16d5_token_inker.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act16d5_token_inker_rep_1.name: Dusk Inkstick
act16d5_token_inker_rep_1.description: On its front, 'starshrouded snow' is engraved in characters from ancient times. Just the talent to create these inksticks can be called rare. Dusk very rarely uses normal inksticks. If she's out of options, employing one to depict one and retrieving one fresh isn't impossible either.
act16d5_token_inker_rep_1.usage: Dusk's handmade inkstick. Nobody knows how they're made. Perhaps you can make use of them to ask her about a few things.
act16d5_token_inker_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act17d0_token_form.name: Rhodes Island Resource Allocation Certificate
act17d0_token_form.description: The certificate bears the signature of the administrator, an anti-counterfeiting watermark, and a detailed record of the supplies needed by the operators and for what reasons they are needed. After these three items have been verified, the responsible personnel will collect the voucher attached to the certificate and distribute the supplies to the field operator.
act17d0_token_form.usage: Rationing certificates issued by Rhodes Island to field operators, including vouchers. Can be used to exchange for supplies in Rhodes Island's landship, regional branches, and various safehouses.
act17d0_token_form.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act17d0_token_form_rep_1.name: Rhodes Island Resource Allocation Certificate
act17d0_token_form_rep_1.description: The certificate bears the signature of the administrator, an anti-counterfeiting watermark, and a detailed record of the supplies needed by the operators and for what reasons they are needed. After these three items have been verified, the responsible personnel will collect the voucher attached to the certificate and distribute the supplies to the field operator.
act17d0_token_form_rep_1.usage: Rationing certificates issued by Rhodes Island to field operators, including vouchers. Can be used to exchange for supplies in Rhodes Island's landship, regional branches, and various safehouses.
act17d0_token_form_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act18d0_token_page.name: Scattered Sketches
act18d0_token_page.description: Mineral, flora, fauna, cities; vestiges of life, and even symbols of civilization. In the meanders of this time overflowing with Originium, countless things fade from Terra's boundless history of organic evolution. Disasters unfold unabatingly, and even the grandest cities all disappear in the end. But there will always be people to record it all. She will come in her slow walk with time.
act18d0_token_page.usage: Specimen sketches scattered all over the ground in a great gale. If you help tidy them up, you can earn some supplies.
act18d0_token_page.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act18d0_token_page_rep_1.name: Scattered Sketches
act18d0_token_page_rep_1.description: Mineral, flora, fauna, cities; vestiges of life, and even symbols of civilization. In the meanders of this time overflowing with Originium, countless things fade from Terra's boundless history of organic evolution. Disasters unfold unabatingly, and even the grandest cities all disappear in the end. But there will always be people to record it all. She will come in her slow walk with time.
act18d0_token_page_rep_1.usage: Specimen sketches scattered all over the ground in a great gale. If you help tidy them up, you can earn some supplies.
act18d0_token_page_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act18d3_token_record.name: Corrupted Iberian Record
act18d3_token_record.description: The urge to accept it comes from a craving that knows no name.
act18d3_token_record.usage: Records already ravaged beyond playability. Can be exchanged with the long-time residents of the ruins for goods.
act18d3_token_record.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act18d3_token_record_rep_1.name: Corrupted Iberian Record
act18d3_token_record_rep_1.description: The urge to accept it comes from a craving that knows no name.
act18d3_token_record_rep_1.usage: Records already ravaged beyond playability. Can be exchanged with the long-time residents of the ruins for goods.
act18d3_token_record_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act7mini_token_permit.name: Clearance Permit
act7mini_token_permit.description: Used to prove the holder's legitimate entry credentials, as well as grant temporary right to remain. Absolutely essential when entering or exiting large nomadic cities. Some places don't check too thoroughly, but it's still best to have your papers on you.
act7mini_token_permit.usage: A customs certificate stamped with proof of border crossings from all over. Can be used to exchange for supplies at the Trading Station. Don't ask what purpose they have for taking these.

act1lock_point_reward.name: Competition Medals
act1lock_point_reward.description: Points gained for taking down OpFor troops, awarded to competitors in the form of medals. Owing to it being forged by Minos smiths, in each medal's engraving is the proverb 'all heroes arise from normal people.'
act1lock_point_reward.usage: A small medal made from metal. Gain certain amounts and receive corresponding competition rewards.
act1lock_point_reward.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act8mini_token_vigilo.name: 'Imagini'
act8mini_token_vigilo.description: Others will regard these as scrawls of unclear significance; Kal'tsit speculates on the Doctor's psychological state with these; in the Doctor's eyes, these fragments have come to piece together a present self.
act8mini_token_vigilo.usage: Irreal images disclosed by id, cognized by ego, constructed by superego.

act12side_token_coupon.name: Mama John's Voucher
act12side_token_coupon.description: Mama John's of Columbia has been offering industrial assembly-line products for all trades, all walks and all rhythms of life in a capacity Bolívar's native industry can't compare to, to the extent that all these vouchers, originally simply issued to promote sales, have become more and more truly valuable. At times, they even serve as the currency for dealings between local small-time gangs.
act12side_token_coupon.usage: Vouchers redeemable at all Mama John's in Dossoles.

act12side_token_coupon_rep_1.name: Mama John's Voucher
act12side_token_coupon_rep_1.description: Mama John's of Columbia has been offering industrial assembly-line products for all trades, all walks and all rhythms of life in a capacity Bolívar's native industry can't compare to, to the extent that all these vouchers, originally simply issued to promote sales, have become more and more truly valuable. At times, they even serve as the currency for dealings between local small-time gangs.
act12side_token_coupon_rep_1.usage: Vouchers redeemable at all Mama John's in Dossoles.

act12side_point_cmemomedal.name: Miss Ch'en Commemorative Medal
act12side_point_cmemomedal.description: Every medal represents Ch'en's swift mid-investigation resolution of incidents unrelated to her assignment from Ms. Candela. During the time she was retained in Dossoles, the city's crime rate reached a record low. As a warning for the local police department, these Ch'en medals have been displayed in the middle of the head office, where you can't miss them.
act12side_point_cmemomedal.usage: Medals specially ordered by Ms. Candela to be cast to commend Ch'en's actions. Accumulate certain amounts and the Dossoles Police Station will issue rewards.

act12side_point_cmemomedal_rep_1.name: Miss Ch'en Commemorative Medal
act12side_point_cmemomedal_rep_1.description: Every medal represents Ch'en's swift mid-investigation resolution of incidents unrelated to her assignment from Ms. Candela. During the time she was retained in Dossoles, the city's crime rate reached a record low. As a warning for the local police department, these Ch'en medals have been displayed in the middle of the head office, where you can't miss them.
act12side_point_cmemomedal_rep_1.usage: Medals specially ordered by Ms. Candela to be cast to commend Ch'en's actions. Accumulate certain amounts and the Dossoles Police Station will issue rewards.

act12side_token_key01.name: [Oni and Tiger Twinned Stars]
act12side_token_key01.description: At the time, Hoshiguma and Swire weren't aware of how they'd handily sorted out Ch'en's objective. The only reason they never ran into her was because Swire immediately dragged Hoshiguma off to go shopping.
act12side_token_key01.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key02.name: [Dragon and Rat in Conflict]
act12side_token_key02.description: That day, that moment Ch'en and Lin Yühsia came out of the A.H.C. Bar, the gunpowder tension between them had everyone following the championship excited beyond belief.
act12side_token_key02.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key03.name: ['Golden Partner']
act12side_token_key03.description: In Swire's belief, she needs a partner just as Hoshiguma is to Ch'en, and simultaneously, she believes Lin Yühsia could become that partner. She's made no small effort to see that happen, and ultimately, you can tell how it turned out just by the look on their faces.
act12side_token_key03.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key04.name: [Holiday's End]
act12side_token_key04.description: Though when she set off to return to Rhodes Island, Ch'en didn't fully understand the city of Dossoles, neither does she believe there'll come a day she truly does. That said, she'll always remember this place.
act12side_token_key04.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act9mini_token_ticket.name: Liść Ticket
act9mini_token_ticket.description: A lottery ticket issued by a company run by a major knight noble family. Some make a fortune overnight while others go bankrupt. Within this little ticket are condensed the joys, sorrows, blood, and tears of those who resign their fate to a throw of the dice.
act9mini_token_ticket.usage: A Kazimierz Major lottery ticket bearing the logo of Pinus Sylvestris. This ticket can be exchanged at the Kazimierz Major Prize Exchange Center for corresponding prizes. Put down your chips, and win your fortune!

act13side_token_model.name: G.K.T. Commemorative Model
act13side_token_model.description: The people use these shining fluorescent lamps to subdue nightfall, such is the light of Kazimierz. In civilized lands, traveling bards sing of gold, wandering knights forced to battle sword with glass. Indifferent are the silent waves; on this small, final vessel, she dredged up glory.
act13side_token_model.usage: A scale miniature of the Land of the Knights, often elaborately laid out in the decorative cases of parlors.
act13side_token_model.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act13side_token_model_rep_1.name: G.K.T. Commemorative Model
act13side_token_model_rep_1.description: The people use these shining fluorescent lamps to subdue nightfall, such is the light of Kazimierz. In civilized lands, traveling bards sing of gold, wandering knights forced to battle sword with glass. Indifferent are the silent waves; on this small, final vessel, she dredged up glory.
act13side_token_model_rep_1.usage: A scale miniature of the Land of the Knights, often elaborately laid out in the decorative cases of parlors.
act13side_token_model_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act13side_token_key.name: File Manager's Key
act13side_token_key.description: The file manager in the darkness has another duty: to cleverly let 'secrets' be found by those in the know. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi have never given up their control of Kazimierz—whether good or ill.
act13side_token_key.usage: A key that can open the underground gate of the Wall of Champions exhibit hall, unlocking some additional information.
act13side_token_key.obtainApproach: Acquiring certain prestige in the event

act13side_token_card.name: General Chamber ID Card
act13side_token_card.description: Within this building of money and power, the tired form of your face serves absolutely no use, vocalizations and brain-thoughts all the more insignificant. In here, only status matters.
act13side_token_card.usage: An ID card granting free access in the General Chamber of Commerce, signaling greater privileges to be open to Rhodes Island.
act13side_token_card.obtainApproach: Acquiring certain prestige in the event

act14side_token_stone.name: Stone of Kjeragandr
act14side_token_stone.description: Kjeragandr's will dwells within. Kjerag's people pray to these, to be blessed and for good health.
act14side_token_stone.usage: A sacred stone blessed by a member of the Vine-Bead Court. Collect a certain amount to exchange with the people for goods.

act14side_token_stone_rep_1.name: Stone of Kjeragandr
act14side_token_stone_rep_1.description: Kjeragandr's will dwells within. Kjerag's people pray to these, to be blessed and for good health.
act14side_token_stone_rep_1.usage: A sacred stone blessed by a member of the Vine-Bead Court. Collect a certain amount to exchange with the people for goods.

uni_set_castle_1.name: Castlesque Furniture Pack I
uni_set_castle_1.description: Furniture manufactured according to the data gathered by operators during their exploration in the castle, now delivered to Rhodes Island to use.
uni_set_castle_1.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the three sets 'Attendant of Artistry,' 'Invitation to Repose' and 'Decaying Husk' in the 'Castlesque' furniture series.

uni_set_castle_2.name: Castlesque Furniture Pack II
uni_set_castle_2.description: Furniture manufactured according to the data gathered by operators during their exploration in the castle, now delivered to Rhodes Island to use.
uni_set_castle_2.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the set 'Dull Remnants' in the 'Castlesque' furniture series.

act10mini_token_ticket.name: Wage Ticket
act10mini_token_ticket.description: Vouchers with no worth anywhere outside of Caladon. These roughly printed vouchers prop up the lives of everyone in the Infected community.
act10mini_token_ticket.usage: Vouchers for material supplies issued by Caladon City to its Infected workers. Can purchase a multitude of goods at thrift shops that the government will not provide.

act15side_token_tea.name: Canned Tea
act15side_token_tea.description: Diligent workers step hurriedly, easy-to-carry jarred tea there in times of need. The tea is chosen with care, pure in color and scent, flavor sweet and light and long-lasting, aftertaste melodious. Numerous brands exist, standing their own ground in drinks sections of supermarkets in every region of Yan, save for Zhe'ergen Signature, which no one pays any mind.
act15side_token_tea.usage: A specialty jarred beverage common in Shangshu. They say it always sells out at inns and teahouses.
act15side_token_tea.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act15side_token_tea_rep_1.name: Canned Tea
act15side_token_tea_rep_1.description: Diligent workers step hurriedly, easy-to-carry jarred tea there in times of need. The tea is chosen with care, pure in color and scent, flavor sweet and light and long-lasting, aftertaste melodious. Numerous brands exist, standing their own ground in drinks sections of supermarkets in every region of Yan, save for Zhe'ergen Signature, which no one pays any mind.
act15side_token_tea_rep_1.usage: A specialty jarred beverage common in Shangshu. They say it always sells out at inns and teahouses.
act15side_token_tea_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

uni_set_act7d5.name: Stories of Afternoon Furniture Pack
uni_set_act7d5.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_act7d5.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Stories of Afternoon event not yet acquired.

return_credit_token.name: Second Authentication Emblem
return_credit_token.description: An emblem specially prepared for those returning to major posts. Granted progressively throughout the course of their familiarization with work.
return_credit_token.usage: An emblem of special authentication distributed internally within Rhodes Island. Collect a certain amount to obtain partial usage rights to Rhodes Island's supplies.

return_credit_token2.name: Second Authentication Emblem
return_credit_token2.description: An emblem specially prepared for those returning to major posts. Granted progressively throughout the course of their familiarization with work.
return_credit_token2.usage: An emblem of special authentication distributed internally within Rhodes Island. Collect a certain amount to obtain partial usage rights to Rhodes Island's supplies.

act16side_token_bolt.name: Etched Bullet Casing
act16side_token_bolt.description: The collectability of a bullet depends on its caliber size. As to why an empty shell can be traded for goods in a dessert shop—You must understand that, as the most popular destination among locals, Lateranian Desserts has always been more than just a dessert shop.
act16side_token_bolt.usage: A collectible somewhat popular among Laterans. Collect enough to exchange with the dessert shop owner for goods.
act16side_token_bolt.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act16side_token_bolt_rep_1.name: Etched Bullet Casing
act16side_token_bolt_rep_1.description: The collectability of a bullet depends on its caliber size. As to why an empty shell can be traded for goods in a dessert shop—You must understand that, as the most popular destination among locals, Lateranian Desserts has always been more than just a dessert shop.
act16side_token_bolt_rep_1.usage: A collectible somewhat popular among Laterans. Collect enough to exchange with the dessert shop owner for goods.
act16side_token_bolt_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

medal_activity_15side_01.name: 'The Joys of Poetry and Wine'
medal_activity_15side_01.description: The proof and recognition of one's achievements in exploration.
medal_activity_15side_01.usage: Unlock the corresponding engraved medal in the Invitation to Wine Engraved Medal Set.

medal_activity_15side_03.name: 'Refreshed in Cold Light'
medal_activity_15side_03.description: The proof and recognition of one's achievements in exploration.
medal_activity_15side_03.usage: Unlock the corresponding engraved medal in the Invitation to Wine Engraved Medal Set.

medal_activity_15side_04.name: 'A Bold Individual'
medal_activity_15side_04.description: The proof and recognition of one's achievements in exploration.
medal_activity_15side_04.usage: Unlock the corresponding engraved medal in the Invitation to Wine Engraved Medal Set.

medal_activity_15side_05.name: 'Visit the Mountains'
medal_activity_15side_05.description: The proof and recognition of one's achievements in exploration.
medal_activity_15side_05.usage: Unlock the corresponding engraved medal in the Invitation to Wine Engraved Medal Set.

uni_set_act10d5.name: Children of Ursus Furniture Pack
uni_set_act10d5.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_act10d5.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Children of Ursus event not yet acquired.

act17side_token_compass.name: Rusted Compass
act17side_token_compass.description: The Iberians of times past guided their course by compass, the needle bearing the weight of their wild ambitions and golden dreams. Naught but ravings nowadays; the needle is broken, the brass is tarnished, and none know the dreadnought's end, bar the silent sea.
act17side_token_compass.usage: All attempts to tread unto the sea have been vain and futile. Where the compass points is certain to be anguished, turbid, and sunken.

act17side_token_compass_rep_1.name: Rusted Compass
act17side_token_compass_rep_1.description: The Iberians of times past guided their course by compass, the needle bearing the weight of their wild ambitions and golden dreams. Naught but ravings nowadays; the needle is broken, the brass is tarnished, and none know the dreadnought's end, bar the silent sea.
act17side_token_compass_rep_1.usage: All attempts to tread unto the sea have been vain and futile. Where the compass points is certain to be anguished, turbid, and sunken.

uni_set_beerhouse.name: Darknights Memoir Furniture Pack
uni_set_beerhouse.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_beerhouse.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Darknights Memoir event not yet acquired.

act18side_token_pieces.name: Sheet Music
act18side_token_pieces.description: The notes scribbled on the staff are jumbled and disorderly. Only the composer himself can, at a glance, make out the soul hidden therein.
act18side_token_pieces.usage: Musicians often misplace their drafts during outbursts of emotion. If you straighten it out and return it to its owner, perhaps you will receive a new piece in return.
act18side_token_pieces.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act19side_token_reagents.name: Mysterious Reagent
act19side_token_reagents.description: Very sensitive to neural activity, and can replace some of the functions of traditional Arts Units. In the Rhine Lab Defense Section's laboratory supplies management handbook, this test reagent's hazard and confidentiality levels are both listed at maximum.
act19side_token_reagents.usage: The latest innovation of Rhine Lab's Energy Section. Collect enough and exchange with the Laboratory Recycling Depot for goods.
act19side_token_reagents.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act11mini_token_card.name: Library Card
act11mini_token_card.description: With this library card, you can read any story that piques your interest. No matter what events may ensue, the time that you spend will all be recorded.
act11mini_token_card.usage: A library card independently issued by the private library. Can be used to read any material, however no items may be removed from the premises.

uni_set_nightView.name: Twilight of Wolumonde Furniture Pack
uni_set_nightView.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_nightView.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Twilight of Wolumonde event not yet acquired.

uni_set_bolivar.name: The Great Chief Returns Furniture Pack
uni_set_bolivar.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_bolivar.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to The Great Chief Returns event not yet acquired.

act20side_token_book.name: Photocopies of 'Stranger Things'
act20side_token_book.description: The pages retain handwriting of all shapes and sizes, the amount even serving to tell you how often the magazine's changed hands. Most of it is meaningless scrawls, but flashes of wisdom are scattered throughout.
act20side_token_book.usage: Photocopies of a gaudy magazine, the contents preposterous, yet well-loved by Durin far and wide. Can be used at the Leaping Gloompincer Market to trade with the Durin for supplies.
act20side_token_book.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act1bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act1bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.
act1bossrush_milestone_point.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act1bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act1bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act12mini_token_component.name: Standard-Issue Component
act12mini_token_component.description: The fast rusting remains of war ambitions, Knightclub knockouts, or perhaps damaged weapon parts. Poses a risk of Originium infection if not handled properly. For some strange reason, occasionally found in common working-class households.
act12mini_token_component.usage: A type of worn-out mechanical part commonly found around Dzwonek, recyclable at city supermarkets across Kazimierz.

act13mini_token_can.name: Nutritional Pet Food Tin
act13mini_token_can.description:
This weekend, the L.G.D. is joining hands with our local stray animal shelters to hold an adoption drive. We hope all our friends in the city able to adopt will jump at the opportunity to give these homeless little ones a chance at a brand new life.
Of course, those who aren't in a position to adopt can still contribute by offering cans of pet food, not to mention the splendid gifts awaiting anyone who donates.
act13mini_token_can.usage: A tin of pet food common to the Lungmen market, cheap and delicious. Just give the ring pull a flick, and you'll have your little dear bounding over to you.

uni_set_fNearl.name: Maria Nearl Furniture Pack
uni_set_fNearl.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_fNearl.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Maria Nearl event not yet acquired.

uni_set_outdoor_1.name: Beachside Impressions Furniture Pack I
uni_set_outdoor_1.description: A room that Mizuki and his friends built in the image of a summer beach. Perhaps this is how it should truly be.
uni_set_outdoor_1.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the two sets 'Drink Party' and 'Cool Core' in the 'Beachside Impressions' furniture series.

uni_set_outdoor_2.name: Beachside Impressions Furniture Pack II
uni_set_outdoor_2.description: A room that Mizuki and his friends built in the image of a summer beach. Perhaps this is how it should truly be.
uni_set_outdoor_2.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the two sets 'Summer Scrapwood' and 'Beach Decor' in the 'Beachside Impressions' furniture series.

act21side_token_permesso.name: Permesso di Importazione
act21side_token_permesso.description: Steaks, seasonal vegetables, and fresh fruit to please any soul, or a little something otherwise. The clever ones know what the famiglie want, and will ready it in advance, to be supplied when the time comes.
act21side_token_permesso.usage: Permits issued by the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare to the famiglie. These grant famiglia members entry to the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare and the right to obtain goods, whether said goods fall under 'alimentare' notwithstanding.
act21side_token_permesso.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act21side_token_permesso_rep_1.name: Permesso di Importazione
act21side_token_permesso_rep_1.description: Steaks, seasonal vegetables, and fresh fruit to please any soul, or a little something otherwise. The clever ones know what the famiglie want, and will ready it in advance, to be supplied when the time comes.
act21side_token_permesso_rep_1.usage: Permits issued by the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare to the famiglie. These grant famiglia members entry to the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare and the right to obtain goods, whether said goods fall under 'alimentare' notwithstanding.
act21side_token_permesso_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

voucher_vigil.name: Vigil's Folder
voucher_vigil.description: These personal notes record thoughts on Nuova Volsinii's construction, the diligence and urgency of the writer plain to see. At the very back, however, are mixed in some pages of traditional Siracusan recipes.
voucher_vigil.usage: A folder storing personal notes. Vigil is obtained the first time this item is obtained, and can improve Vigil's Potential thereafter.

itempack_mod_6.name: Integrated Module Data Box
itempack_mod_6.description: Fruit of the blood and sweat of our colleagues in Engineering, this data box stockpiles a ridiculous amount of data, able to meet an Operator Module's requirements on all fronts at once.
itempack_mod_6.usage: Contains items for unlocking and upgrading Operator Modules.

itempack_mod_4.name: Integrated Module Data Chunk
itempack_mod_4.description: Fruit of the blood and sweat of our colleagues in Engineering, this data chunk includes the data and information to meet an Operator Module's foundational requirements.
itempack_mod_4.usage: Contains items for unlocking and upgrading Operator Modules.

uni_set_prison.name: Mansfield Break Furniture Pack
uni_set_prison.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_prison.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Mansfield Break event not yet acquired.

act22side_token_manuscript.name: Manuscripts of Ballads
act22side_token_manuscript.description: Few who know these folksongs are able to put them in writing, while those who pen Taran history wouldn't go out of their way to listen. But there'll always be people devoted to compiling the scattered culture of Tara, say the merchants, and it's a business that's gone on for several centuries.
act22side_token_manuscript.usage: Pages filled with Taran folksongs and legends, copied down as heard. Collect enough, and you'll be able to trade them with the River Valley Caravan for goods.
act22side_token_manuscript.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act22side_token_manuscript_rep_1.name: Manuscripts of Ballads
act22side_token_manuscript_rep_1.description: Few who know these folksongs are able to put them in writing, while those who pen Taran history wouldn't go out of their way to listen. But there'll always be people devoted to compiling the scattered culture of Tara, say the merchants, and it's a business that's gone on for several centuries.
act22side_token_manuscript_rep_1.usage: Pages filled with Taran folksongs and legends, copied down as heard. Collect enough, and you'll be able to trade them with the River Valley Caravan for goods.
act22side_token_manuscript_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act2bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act2bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act2bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.
act2bossrush_milestone_point.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act2bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act2bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act2bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

uni_set_inkArt.name: Who is Real Furniture Pack
uni_set_inkArt.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_inkArt.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Who is Real event not yet acquired.

uni_set_icu.name: A Walk in the Dust Furniture Pack
uni_set_icu.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_icu.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the A Walk in the Dust event not yet acquired.

uni_set_abyssal.name: Under Tides Furniture Pack
uni_set_abyssal.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_abyssal.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Under Tides event not yet acquired.

uni_set_westCoast.name: Dossoles Holiday Furniture Pack
uni_set_westCoast.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_westCoast.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Dossoles Holiday event not yet acquired.

uni_set_kazimierz.name: Near Light Furniture Pack
uni_set_kazimierz.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_kazimierz.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Near Light event not yet acquired.

uni_set_stage.name: Break the Ice Furniture Pack
uni_set_stage.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_stage.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Break the Ice event not yet acquired.

uni_set_teaHouse.name: Invitation to Wine Furniture Pack
uni_set_teaHouse.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_teaHouse.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Invitation to Wine event not yet acquired.

uni_set_goldBoat.name: Stultifera Navis Furniture Pack
uni_set_goldBoat.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_goldBoat.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Stultifera Navis event not yet acquired.

act23side_token_spirit.name: Freshly-Brewed Liedaozi
act23side_token_spirit.description: A Yumen specialty product, high-purity spirit. Beloved by all drinkers, brewed by all brewers. A brew mixed of sandstorms on the border, and sun beating down in the sky and wind on the poplars, one gulp is a throat of blades and a drink of fire, and even the chilliest nights need no longer be feared.
act23side_token_spirit.usage: Take a jar of freshly brewed spirit, and trade it with the old smith for a newly-edged sword of fine craft. 'Blood for water, wine for a blade. A close friend crossed by, grace and vengeance all too willing.'
act23side_token_spirit.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act23side_token_spirit_rep_1.name: Freshly-Brewed Liedaozi
act23side_token_spirit_rep_1.description: A Yumen specialty product, high-purity spirit. Beloved by all drinkers, brewed by all brewers. A brew mixed of sandstorms on the border, and sun beating down in the sky and wind on the poplars, one gulp is a throat of blades and a drink of fire, and even the chilliest nights need no longer be feared.
act23side_token_spirit_rep_1.usage: Take a jar of freshly brewed spirit, and trade it with the old smith for a newly-edged sword of fine craft. 'Blood for water, wine for a blade. A close friend crossed by, grace and vengeance all too willing.'
act23side_token_spirit_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1sandbox_milestone_point.name: Badge of Prosperity
act1sandbox_milestone_point.description: Life prospers, age passes down to age, and this is their proof.
act1sandbox_milestone_point.usage: Can be exchanged at milestones for rewards.

act14mini_token_fu.name: Wellbeing Charm
act14mini_token_fu.description: A wellbeing charm hand-carved by the Moushan villagers to pray for blessings. Take it to Yishan Temple, have the censer acolyte bestow it a stroke of cinnabar, and it may put you all the more at ease.
