act14mini_token_fu.usage: A plaque carved of crude peachwood. When a year's harvest is good, some are willing to exchange their foodstuffs with the elderly, whose consummate craft produces these charms, by which auspiciousness is sought.

voucher_ulika.name: U-Official's Folder
voucher_ulika.description: A bunch of papers recording the streamer's various experiences in cute handwriting, but when flipped over becomes a map of a nomadic city, with detailed markings noting the frequency of debt collectors showing up.
voucher_ulika.usage: A folder with handwritten notes inside. Used to obtain U-Official for the first time, and subsequently improve the potential of U-Official.

favor_add_ulika.name: Streamer U's Stream Clips
favor_add_ulika.description: A storage device with recordings of the most wonderful livestream moments, and can be used to raise the trust of U-Official.

act24side_melding_1.name: Bone Fragments
act24side_melding_1.description: Shattered bone fragments found in the barrens, weathered by wind for years. Their original, complete form can no longer be identified. Perhaps they once belonged to some great beast, but now they are nothing but low-grade materials that can be found anywhere.
act24side_melding_1.usage: A common low-grade material usable in Alchemy.
act24side_melding_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act24side_melding_2.name: Originium Slug Shell
act24side_melding_2.description: The hard outer shell of an Originium Slug covered in tiny clusters of Originium. Tastes slightly bitter when licked. Even though there are many types of Originium Slugs out there, the quality of the materials they yield doesn't vary much at all.
act24side_melding_2.usage: A regular material usable in Alchemy, obtainable by putting in just a little bit of work.
act24side_melding_2.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act24side_melding_3.name: Sharp Oxmane Fangs
act24side_melding_3.description: The sharp fangs of an Oxmane, so sharp that they can tear apart flesh with ease. They serve as an excellent Alchemy material. As a reminder, they must not be used in place of dentures.
act24side_melding_3.usage: A fine material usable in Alchemy, obtainable by putting in a fair amount of work.
act24side_melding_3.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act24side_melding_4.name: Thick Direswine Hide
act24side_melding_4.description: The thick hide of Direswines, elastic and able to withstand great impact force. To obtain this material, one must first go through very intense battles. It takes lots of effort to get a taste of Direswine rind jelly.
act24side_melding_4.usage: A rare, high-grade material usable in Alchemy.
act24side_melding_4.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act24side_melding_5.name: 'Monster Tears'
act24side_melding_5.description: A kind of crystal as clear as tears. Supposedly, they formed in the carcasses of a now extinct creature. When observed closely under light, you can even see the stars flow and circulate.
act24side_melding_5.usage: An extremely rare, top-of-the-line material usable in Alchemy.
act24side_melding_5.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act24side_melding_6.name: Rathalos Ruby
act24side_melding_6.description: A rare gem that occasionally grows in the wyvern's body. Hunters who are lucky enough to get their hands on them often find themselves hesitant when processing them.
act24side_melding_6.usage: A material obtainable from battling a Rathalos. Perfect as melding material.
act24side_melding_6.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

LINKAGE_TKT_GACHA_10_3602.name: Collaboration Limited Ten-roll Headhunting Permit
LINKAGE_TKT_GACHA_10_3602.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
LINKAGE_TKT_GACHA_10_3602.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

itempack_gacha_1.name: Bounteous Fortunes Gift Bag
itempack_gacha_1.description: A gift bag obtained during the Roka Village's special prayer event, containing well wishes that will guide you toward a merry future.
itempack_gacha_1.usage: Obtain 'Collaboration Limited Ten-roll Headhunting Permit' and avatar 'Soubo Impressions.' 'Collaboration Limited Ten-roll Headhunting Permit' expires 09/21/2023 03:59

classic_normal_ticket.name: Universal Certificates
classic_normal_ticket.description: Time has allowed these operators to gain a deep understanding of Rhodes Island's affairs. They will provide you the rare resources you need.
classic_normal_ticket.usage: A certificate that attests an operator possesses core abilities. Can be exchanged for rare materials.

classic_gacha.name: Kernel Headhunting Permit
classic_gacha.description: Rhodes Island's expansion is inseparable from the help and support it has received from kernel personnel. This headhunting item will assist the Doctor in recruiting talent within specified bounds.
classic_gacha.usage: A special permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution for recruiting a single kernel talent.

classic_gacha_10.name: Ten-roll Kernel Headhunting Permit
classic_gacha_10.description: Rhodes Island's expansion is inseparable from the help and support it has received from kernel personnel. These headhunting items will assist the Doctor in recruiting talent within specified bounds.
classic_gacha_10.usage: A special permit from Rhodes Island HR distribution for recruiting multiple kernel talents. Can be used to recruit ten operators.

Logistics_Special_Permit.name: Logistics Special Permit
Logistics_Special_Permit.description: A Logistics Special Permit issued by Rhodes Island to ensure the successful execution of emergency dispatches, owing to ever-increasing activity on the battlefield. With this, operators may request top priority support from Logistics via PRTS. Logistics operators will prioritize delivering extra supplies and assist in locating nearby resources.
Logistics_Special_Permit.usage: When the Logistics Special Permit is used, operations consume no Sanity and the normal Regular Drops are changed to Guaranteed Drops with 3x quantity.

classic_fes_pick_tier_5_3801.name: Kernel Locating 5* Operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_3801.description: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_3801.usage: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_3801.obtainApproach: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator

classic_fes_pick_tier_6_3801.name: Kernel Locating 6* Operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_3801.description: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_3801.usage: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_3801.obtainApproach: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator

act25side_token_fdrchips.name: Flight Data Recorder Chip
act25side_token_fdrchips.description: Aside from the data hidden by Nasti all over the lands, new data are continually produced with the federal government's support. Columbia is gradually realizing the value of Kristen's research.
act25side_token_fdrchips.usage: A chip containing flight data recorded at various altitudes and environments. Collect a certain amount to exchange with the Special Case Contact C.U.D.O.D. for goods.
act25side_token_fdrchips.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act25side_token_fdrchips_rep_1.name: Flight Data Recorder Chip
act25side_token_fdrchips_rep_1.description: Aside from the data hidden by Nasti all over the lands, new data are continually produced with the federal government's support. Columbia is gradually realizing the value of Kristen's research.
act25side_token_fdrchips_rep_1.usage: A chip containing flight data recorded at various altitudes and environments. Collect a certain amount to exchange with the Special Case Contact C.U.D.O.D. for goods.
act25side_token_fdrchips_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act25side_token_key01.name: Special Ops Permit α
act25side_token_key01.description: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.
act25side_token_key01.usage: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.

act25side_token_key02.name: Special Ops Permit β
act25side_token_key02.description: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.
act25side_token_key02.usage: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.

act38d1_token_coin.name: Crystalized Originium
act38d1_token_coin.description: A chunk of flawless Originium crystal. The Sanctuary considers it a precious treasure.
act38d1_token_coin.usage: Reward obtained by completing Pinch-Out Experimental Operation. Can be exchanged for supplies.

act26side_token_fragmenta.name: Holy Statue Fragments
act26side_token_fragmenta.description: Holy Statue Fragments telling of all sorts of damage lie forgotten in every nook and cranny of the monastery, each shard unlike any other. These may never again piece together to form the complete image of a saint with a gun, but there are always those hanging onto hope.
act26side_token_fragmenta.usage: Statues of saints bearing guns were once ornamental mainstays all over the monastery, but most are now nowhere to be seen. The monastery's devout followers are willing to barter what supplies they have in exchange for these fragments.
act26side_token_fragmenta.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act26side_token_fragmenta_rep_1.name: Holy Statue Fragments
act26side_token_fragmenta_rep_1.description: Holy Statue Fragments telling of all sorts of damage lie forgotten in every nook and cranny of the monastery, each shard unlike any other. These may never again piece together to form the complete image of a saint with a gun, but there are always those hanging onto hope.
act26side_token_fragmenta_rep_1.usage: Statues of saints bearing guns were once ornamental mainstays all over the monastery, but most are now nowhere to be seen. The monastery's devout followers are willing to barter what supplies they have in exchange for these fragments.
act26side_token_fragmenta_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act18side_token_pieces_rep_1.name: Sheet Music
act18side_token_pieces_rep_1.description: The notes scribbled on the staff are jumbled and disorderly. Only the composer himself can, at a glance, make out the soul hidden therein.
act18side_token_pieces_rep_1.usage: Musicians often misplace their drafts during outbursts of emotion. If you straighten it out and return it to its owner, perhaps you will receive a new piece in return.
act18side_token_pieces_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act15mini_token_figurine.name: Guiding Figurines
act15mini_token_figurine.description: So that others may more easily find supplies hidden in the forest, the hunters have made simple waymarkers. Be sure to restock some too after you avail of them, for the trees know all.
act15mini_token_figurine.usage: A crude carving left behind by the hunters. Wooden figures with indistinct features reach forth an arm, pointing to caves stockpiled with food, remedies, and tools.

mcardVoucher.name: Monthly Card Exchange Permit
mcardVoucher.description: With an eye to negotiability and convenience, several new permits have risen to the task, and this just so happens to be one of them.
mcardVoucher.usage: Enables activation of Monthly Card privileges.

act19side_token_reagents_rep_1.name: Mysterious Reagent
act19side_token_reagents_rep_1.description: Very sensitive to neural activity, and can replace some of the functions of traditional Arts Units. In the Rhine Lab Defense Section's laboratory supplies management handbook, this test reagent's hazard and confidentiality levels are both listed at maximum.
act19side_token_reagents_rep_1.usage: The latest innovation of Rhine Lab's Energy Section. Collect enough and exchange with the Laboratory Recycling Depot for goods.
act19side_token_reagents_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

premium_material_issue_voucher.name: Premium Material Voucher
premium_material_issue_voucher.description: In order to address scarcities of certain materials during processing, the Procurement Department has issued exchange vouchers for operators' discretionary use, granting access to the materials needed.
premium_material_issue_voucher.usage: A special exchange voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Procurement Department. Can be used within a limited time to obtain premium elite materials.

advanced_material_issue_voucher.name: Advanced Material Voucher
advanced_material_issue_voucher.description: In order to address scarcities of certain materials during processing, the Procurement Department has issued exchange vouchers for operators' discretionary use, granting access to the materials needed.
advanced_material_issue_voucher.usage: A special exchange voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Procurement Department. Can be used within a limited time to obtain advanced elite materials.

classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4101.name: Kernel Locating 5* Operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4101.description: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4101.usage: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4101.obtainApproach: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator

classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4101.name: Kernel Locating 6* Operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4101.description: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4101.usage: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4101.obtainApproach: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator

classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4401.name: Kernel Locating 5* Operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4401.description: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4401.usage: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_5_4401.obtainApproach: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 5-star operator

classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4401.name: Kernel Locating 6* Operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4401.description: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4401.usage: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator
classic_fes_pick_tier_6_4401.obtainApproach: Boosts the pull rate of one chosen 6-star operator

act27side_token_fur.name: Fluffy Critter Wool
act27side_token_fur.description: Soft, insulating, and highly absorptive, it might look extremely delicious, but please don't start eating it like cotton candy.
act27side_token_fur.usage: Looks good for padding outdoors thermal equipment, but seems to have little use in the current season. The young girl at 'White Volcano' has an inexplicable love for bizarre wool like this, and will surreptitiously trade you goods from the shop for it. N.B.: DO NOT let her big brother know!
act27side_token_fur.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act3bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act3bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act3bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.
act3bossrush_milestone_point.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act3bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act3bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act3bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act20side_token_book_rep_1.name: Photocopies of 'Stranger Things'
act20side_token_book_rep_1.description: The pages retain handwriting of all shapes and sizes, the amount even serving to tell you how often the magazine's changed hands. Most of it is meaningless scrawls, but flashes of wisdom are scattered throughout.
act20side_token_book_rep_1.usage: Photocopies of a gaudy magazine, the contents preposterous, yet well-loved by Durin far and wide. Can be used at the Leaping Gloompincer Market to trade with the Durin for supplies.
act20side_token_book_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

uni_set_samiRoom_1.name: Sami Impressions Furniture Pack I
uni_set_samiRoom_1.description: A Sami forest cabin recreated based on Magallan's notes and the supplementary reports from other operators who participated in the expedition. Quiet and simple, as things have always been.
uni_set_samiRoom_1.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the two sets 'Dreamland Signposts' and 'Words of Nature' in the 'Sami Impressions' furniture series.

uni_set_samiRoom_2.name: Sami Impressions Furniture Pack II
uni_set_samiRoom_2.description: A Sami forest cabin recreated based on Magallan's notes and the supplementary reports from other operators who participated in the expedition. Quiet and simple, as things have always been.
uni_set_samiRoom_2.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the two sets 'Life in the Forest' and 'Fireside Twitters' in the 'Sami Impressions' furniture series.

act28side_token_box.name: Shoddy Fuel
act28side_token_box.description: Plastics, paper, wood... even scrapped Originium circuitry. Their only commonality is that they all burn when thrown in the power plant, and provide the plate with just that much more heat.
act28side_token_box.usage: Combustibles salvaged from Davistown and its environs. Practically worthless for heat, and produces way too much smoke, but fuel is fuel and there's an old worker by the energy tower who'll trade goods from the mine for it.
act28side_token_box.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act28side_token_box_rep_1.name: Shoddy Fuel
act28side_token_box_rep_1.description: Plastics, paper, wood... even scrapped Originium circuitry. Their only commonality is that they all burn when thrown in the power plant, and provide the plate with just that much more heat.
act28side_token_box_rep_1.usage: Combustibles salvaged from Davistown and its environs. Practically worthless for heat, and produces way too much smoke, but fuel is fuel and there's an old worker by the energy tower who'll trade goods from the mine for it.
act28side_token_box_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1mainlinebp_token_star.name: Milestone Fragment
act1mainlinebp_token_star.description: A flickering, glinting fragment. A light so that you no longer fear the dark as you walk dauntlessly on through the thorns.
act1mainlinebp_token_star.usage: Can be exchanged for Milestone Rewards.
act1mainlinebp_token_star.obtainApproach: From event-exclusive drops and event missions

act42d0_token_evaluation.name: Experimental Dataset
act42d0_token_evaluation.description: 'WARNING! Please refrain from undue perception of/empathy with simulation products, or subsequent generation of false data may lead to irreversible mental damage.'
act42d0_token_evaluation.usage: Stores operation data from the Formulative Battlerealm. Accumulate to advance Cogitative Diving Evaluation progress.

act29side_token_erin.name: Die Klänge von den Erinnerungen
act29side_token_erin.description: Memories of the past are scattered across the ancient capital of Leithanien, carried by broken passages of music. Like today's Leithanien, they will need be tuned before they can be heard.
act29side_token_erin.usage: Leaves that fall on the streets of Zwillingstürme. Missing phrases of music can be found on them from time to time. Give them to tune seekers at concerts and be rewarded with the gift of music.
act29side_token_erin.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act29side_frag_1.name: Note of Joy
act29side_frag_1.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through joy.
act29side_frag_1.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_2.name: Note of Anger
act29side_frag_2.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through anger.
act29side_frag_2.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_3.name: Note of Sorrow
act29side_frag_3.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through sorrow.
act29side_frag_3.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_4.name: Note of Fear
act29side_frag_4.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through fear.
act29side_frag_4.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

voucher_lessng.name: Lessing's Folder
voucher_lessng.description: Several proverbs are written on the paper with tidy, print-like handwriting. The pen has penetrated the paper in a few places. There are also a few scribbles about things that need to be done.
voucher_lessng.usage: A folder storing personal notes. Lessing is obtained the first time this item is obtained, and can improve Lessing's Potential thereafter.

act30side_token_box.name: Burdenbeast Blind Box
act30side_token_box.description:
Blind boxes from the cultural industries in collaboration with 'BangBang Burdenbeast.' Collect all nine, including a limited-edition secret burdenbeast.
NOTE: Pray faithfully to the newly erected Kjeragandr statue, and your odds of drawing the secret one go up!
act30side_token_box.usage: Burdenbeast Blind Boxes—such a smash hit, Onboard Services ran out of stock for a time. That means this batch couldn't have come sooner, and the train attendants will be delighted to trade other goods for it.
act30side_token_box.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act16mini_token_sap.name: Spicy Bottletree Sap
act16mini_token_sap.description: Bottletree sap naturally fermented in the abdomens of tree-hanging Originium slugs, celebrated by man and adored by sandbeasts. Still, how the beasts get the sap when they can't climb trees is one of Rim Billiton's great mysteries. Are there feral barreners helping them? Can't be...
act16mini_token_sap.usage: Extremely spicy and fantastically invigorating, with a deep velvet flavor fresh bottletree sap can't hope to match. And the upside of not chronically ruining your body like hard liquor would. Give it to wild sandbeasts, and you might end up trading for their stashed curios.

sandbox_1_tokencoin.name: Prosperity Point
sandbox_1_tokencoin.description: Each bead of sweat shed upon the barren ground will one day bear witness to the prospering of Terran civilization.
sandbox_1_tokencoin.usage: A voucher that can be exchanged for rewards at 'Expansional Rewards'.

uni_set_SargonFair_1.name: Arsalan Furniture Collection I
uni_set_SargonFair_1.description: When the region's so close to the foehn hotlands, furnishings like these in Arsalan add a precious hint of comfort to your room.
uni_set_SargonFair_1.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the 'Arakeeshtu Jungle' and 'Narutabatim Alkalies' sets in the 'Arsalan Travel Tent' furniture series.

uni_set_SargonFair_2.name: Arsalan Furniture Collection II
uni_set_SargonFair_2.description: When the region's so close to the foehn hotlands, furnishings like these in Arsalan add a precious hint of comfort to your room.
uni_set_SargonFair_2.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the 'Eqlumuy Oasis' and 'Traditions' sets in the 'Arsalan Travel Tent' furniture series.

act31side_token_box.name: Sky Pole
act31side_token_box.description: The newest fruit borne of the Dahuang Tianshi Bureau's research. Simple to control, resiliently mobile. Sample-taking and soil monitoring are among its many functions. Naughty children occasionally make off with them to use in 'fowl fights.'
act31side_token_box.usage: An agricultural drone developed by the Tianshi Bureaus, which people occasionally leave lying in the fields after they malfunction. If you pick any up, you can exchange them for goods at Shennong Market.
act31side_token_box.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act4bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act4bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act4bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.
act4bossrush_milestone_point.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act4bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act4bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act4bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

uni_set_NHL.name: Guide Ahead Furniture Collection Set
uni_set_NHL.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_NHL.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Guide Ahead event not yet acquired.

act32side_token_stamp.name: Galería Stamp Card
act32side_token_stamp.description: Upon seeing these cards, Tecno indifferently thumbs at a row of halved radishes in the corner of her workshop, each cross-section dyed through in seal ink and ready to go.
act32side_token_stamp.usage: A card for the Galería stamp rally. The more stamps, the more prizes you get. Despite each and every card bearing the limited-daily ultra-rare secret stamps, Reynell will still gladly exchange them for goods. In his words, 'my small token of respect to our anonymous seal-forger supreme.'
act32side_token_stamp.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act33side_token_sugar.name: Raw Sugar Lumps
act33side_token_sugar.description: Crude sugar cubes of mechanized make, a Babel wartime supply ration. Provides soldiers with ample energy and a hint of sweetness.
act33side_token_sugar.usage: A 'hard currency' aboard Babel. Save up enough to spare, and the nice Vampire lady down by the Engineering Team will trade for some scarcities you'll appreciate.
act33side_token_sugar.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

SINGLE_49_0_1_GACHA.name: Like Ending Like Death Headhunting Permit
SINGLE_49_0_1_GACHA.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
SINGLE_49_0_1_GACHA.usage: A special permit from Rhodes Island HR for recruiting special talents at special points in time. Can be used to recruit one operator.

SINGLE_49_0_1_GACHA_10.name: Like Ending Like Death Ten-roll Headhunting Permit
SINGLE_49_0_1_GACHA_10.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
SINGLE_49_0_1_GACHA_10.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

LIMITED_TKT_GACHA_10_5001.name: Dawn Enkindlers Headhunting Permit
LIMITED_TKT_GACHA_10_5001.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
LIMITED_TKT_GACHA_10_5001.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

act1mainss_token_medi.name: Emergency Inhibitor
act1mainss_token_medi.description: WARNING: For best results, administer via peripheral IV. In case of first-aid, can attempt via CVC. If shock ensues after first dose, second IV may be administered within 5-7 minutes (repeat dose). EACH DOSE COULD BE THE KEY TO SAVING A LIFE IN THE FIELD. MAKE GOOD USE OF THEM.
act1mainss_token_medi.usage: A new formulation from Rhodes Island's Medical R&D, capable of temporarily suppressing the exacerbation of Oripathy in Catastrophe- or battlefield-level Originium zones. THIS DRUG PLACES IMMENSE STRAIN ON THE BODY. USE WITH CAUTION.

act2vmulti_token_cap.name: Memento
act2vmulti_token_cap.description: As you collect Mementos, so does Hype. Reach certain Hype levels to receive rewards.
act2vmulti_token_cap.usage: Leave your sweat in the stadium. Come home with camaraderie.

act34side_token_chip.name: 'Emergency Supplies' Blueprint Chip
act34side_token_chip.description: 'Emergency Supplies' Blueprint Chip that contains nearly a thousand ready-to-print blueprints, including survival necessities and equipment for experiments and creative activities. Do not neglect exploration and expression, no matter how dire the circumstances, for the stagnation of the mind and numbing of the spirit is akin to death.
act34side_token_chip.usage: Microchip that holds a large number of blueprints, which can be printed at the Materianomicon Moderatrix.
act34side_token_chip.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act17mini_token_ash.name: Slag
act17mini_token_ash.description: A large piece of slag that was ejected from the Soul Furnace for unknown reasons, which shattered into pieces when bombarded by the airship. It contains trace amounts of Originium and Oriron, but extraction is extremely difficult.
act17mini_token_ash.usage: Fireworks pieces that fell from the sky. The custodian of a certain furnace node is looking for it, but what you get in return for it seems to differ from person to person.

act27side_token_fur_rep_1.name: Fluffy Critter Wool
act27side_token_fur_rep_1.description: Soft, insulating, and highly absorptive, it might look extremely delicious, but please don't start eating it like cotton candy.
act27side_token_fur_rep_1.usage: Looks good for padding outdoors thermal equipment, but seems to have little use in the current season. The young girl at 'White Volcano' has an inexplicable love for bizarre wool like this, and will surreptitiously trade you goods from the shop for it. N.B.: DO NOT let her big brother know!
act27side_token_fur_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

uni_set_MemoryCloister_1.name: Memories of the Souls Furniture Pack I
uni_set_MemoryCloister_1.description: A room based on what the storytellers saw as they traversed the strange tales. The Logistics Department designer brought their entire imagination to bear, but the storytellers still think the furnishings lack the odd magnificence of the real deal.
uni_set_MemoryCloister_1.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the two sets 'Melancholy of Dust' and 'Unending Omens' in the 'Memories of the Souls' furniture pack.

uni_set_MemoryCloister_2.name: Memories of the Souls Furniture Pack II
uni_set_MemoryCloister_2.description: A room based on what the storytellers saw as they traversed the strange tales. The Logistics Department designer brought their entire imagination to bear, but the storytellers still think the furnishings lack the odd magnificence of the real deal.
uni_set_MemoryCloister_2.usage: Obtain the furniture belonging to the two sets 'Reborn in a Dream' and 'Chronological Eddies' in the 'Memories of the Souls' furniture pack.

act35side_token_dust.name: Flowing Glimmerdust
act35side_token_dust.description: A tourist souvenir from the City of Radiance. It is said that artificers can turn them into large gemstones. 'A padishah once ordered all the gems accumulated in his palace over a thousand years to be ground into fine grains of sand and scattered at the bottom of the garden pond, just so that the citizens could share in the radiance.' - Exhibit label on a mummy in the museum
act35side_token_dust.usage: Fine grains of gems that glitter like stars in the sky, older than the City of Radiance, and brighter than its hidden treasures.
act35side_token_dust.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1collection_point_token.name: 'Expeditioners' Redemption Point
act1collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special reward points as an incentive to field operators dispatched to the base building operation in Szubat-Arsalan. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act1collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.
act1collection_point_token.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

act36side_token_recipe.name: Daily Recipe
act36side_token_recipe.description: A reminder for certain operators, especially Kay: The meals recommended in the cookbook are FULL meals! Stop asking if they're just snacks already!
act36side_token_recipe.usage: A daily recipe waiting to be sent to Senshi's Dungeon Diner. If it's nutritionally balanced, you'll get a prize. If you're not sure which ingredients go with which, you can ask Matterhorn, Gummy, or Hibiscus.
act36side_token_recipe.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1vecb_milestone_point.name: Attainment Point
act1vecb_milestone_point.description: Special memorabilia of Rhodes Island Engineering Department make. Apparently, the Engineering op who designed it took inspiration from a board game that's been all the rage at Rhodes Island.
act1vecb_milestone_point.usage: Can be exchanged at Breakthrough Milestones for rewards.

uni_set_court.name: Il Siracusano Furniture Pack
uni_set_court.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_court.usage: Obtain all furniture exclusive to the Il Siracusano event not yet acquired.

SINGLE_55_0_1_GACHA.name: Never Gilded Headhunting Permit
SINGLE_55_0_1_GACHA.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
SINGLE_55_0_1_GACHA.usage: A special permit from Rhodes Island HR for recruiting special talents at special points in time. Can be used to recruit one operator.

SINGLE_55_0_1_GACHA_10.name: Exclusive Ten-roll Headhunting Permit
SINGLE_55_0_1_GACHA_10.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
SINGLE_55_0_1_GACHA_10.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

act37side_token_nay.name: 'Nay!'
act37side_token_nay.description:
An emblem personally gifted by the Madam Speaker for outstanding behavior during battle or reconstruction. Anyone can use them as valuable tokens of opposition during the notice periods of the proposals deciding Londinium's future.
Note that Parliament strictly forbids the trading of this honor!
act37side_token_nay.usage: Every respectable citizen has the right to oppose Parliament's public proposals, and these emblems are Parliament's acknowledgment of said right. But rumor has it that some civil servants at the Office of Proposed Resolutions will secretly trade goods for this valuable right?
act37side_token_nay.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act38side_token_ticket.name: Invito Mistico
act38side_token_ticket.description: The anonymous sender calls themselves 'Il Signore del Carnevale'. It is unclear if this title is a threat or in jest. The dark red soaking the paper isn't blood, but rather a fragrant wine, which seems to say that this invitation was born alongside Carnevale itself.
act38side_token_ticket.usage: Invitations handed out by an anonymous figure at Carnevale. You can exchange them for generous gifts at any Fiera delle Meraviglie Notturne. Relax, once people see the invitation, you will receive a warm welcome.
act38side_token_ticket.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1vautochess_token_chess.name: Stronghold Credits
act1vautochess_token_chess.description: Medals prepared by Rhodes Island's workshop for operators participating in Stronghold Protocol. Magnetic. Apparently, if you gather enough of them, you can make a fortress out of chess pieces.
act1vautochess_token_chess.usage: Can be exchanged for all sorts of supplies in Stronghold Protocol.
act1vautochess_token_chess.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act29side_token_erin_rep_1.name: Die Klänge von den Erinnerungen
act29side_token_erin_rep_1.description: Memories of the past are scattered across the ancient capital of Leithanien, carried by broken passages of music. Like today's Leithanien, they will need be tuned before they can be heard.
act29side_token_erin_rep_1.usage: Leaves that fall on the streets of Zwillingstürme. Missing phrases of music can be found on them from time to time. Give them to tune seekers at concerts and be rewarded with the gift of music.
act29side_token_erin_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act29side_frag_1_rep_1.name: Note of Joy
act29side_frag_1_rep_1.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through joy.
act29side_frag_1_rep_1.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_2_rep_1.name: Note of Anger
act29side_frag_2_rep_1.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through anger.
act29side_frag_2_rep_1.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_3_rep_1.name: Note of Sorrow
act29side_frag_3_rep_1.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through sorrow.
act29side_frag_3_rep_1.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_4_rep_1.name: Note of Fear
act29side_frag_4_rep_1.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through fear.
act29side_frag_4_rep_1.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act39side_token_garum.name: Saltfin Garum
act39side_token_garum.description: Beverage made from chopped saltfin viscera and fermented with microorganisms from the underground rivers beneath the Salt Flat. The stench is both invigorating and tear-inducing. And as for its other properties... 'Has anyone told that idiota in the kitchen that you don't need to add any goddamn salt to a saltfin?!'
act39side_token_garum.usage: Both the daily drink of the pirates of the Salt Flat, and a currency they accept. So long as the fleet lacks priceless treasures such as rum, it will never be replaced.
act39side_token_garum.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act1arcade_milestone_point.name: Point Card
act1arcade_milestone_point.description: The cards might be small, but get enough of them and you can trade them in for big prizes!
act1arcade_milestone_point.usage: A reward for first clearing stages which can be used to buy prizes at the Exchange Counter; subsequent reclears will not reward more.

act30side_token_box_rep_1.name: Burdenbeast Blind Box
act30side_token_box_rep_1.description:
Blind boxes from the cultural industries in collaboration with 'BangBang Burdenbeast.' Collect all nine, including a limited-edition secret burdenbeast.
NOTE: Pray faithfully to the newly erected Kjeragandr statue, and your odds of drawing the secret one go up!
act30side_token_box_rep_1.usage: Burdenbeast Blind Boxes—such a smash hit, Onboard Services ran out of stock for a time. That means this batch couldn't have come sooner, and the train attendants will be delighted to trade other goods for it.
act30side_token_box_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act2collection_point_token.name: 'Strategist' Point
act2collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special reward points as an incentive to field operators contributing to Integrated Strategies operations. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act2collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.
act2collection_point_token.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

act40side_token_yumyum.name: 'Yum-yum!'
act40side_token_yumyum.description: Fragrant meals fear not alleys deep. While invisible to the eye on most days, there is a faint aroma lining the streets, at least until it hits you face-first in front of the restaurant it leads to. You need only follow the scent of food to paint a grand picture of Baizao's streets.
act40side_token_yumyum.usage: Don't be stingy when it comes to complimenting how the food smells at Savors at Yu's. Once the Young Chef's ears go red from praise, he'll discreetly add a few extra bits of meat to your plate.
act40side_token_yumyum.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act31side_token_box_rep_1.name: Sky Pole
act31side_token_box_rep_1.description: The newest fruit borne of the Dahuang Tianshi Bureau's research. Simple to control, resiliently mobile. Sample-taking and soil monitoring are among its many functions. Naughty children occasionally make off with them to use in 'fowl fights.'
act31side_token_box_rep_1.usage: An agricultural drone developed by the Tianshi Bureaus, which people occasionally leave lying in the fields after they malfunction. If you pick any up, you can exchange them for goods at Shennong Market.
act31side_token_box_rep_1.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward

act18mini_token_petals.name: Broken Petals
act18mini_token_petals.description: A shattered yet still brilliant crystal shaped like a petal, often seen among death-blackened scorched earth. They are ripples left behind by traveling Canoes, engraved with the final memories and emotions of those who passed away.
act18mini_token_petals.usage: A crystal of blood left behind in the battlefield ruins. It is said that if you place it in a deserted nook where roses bloom, when the twin moons are at their brightest, the fortunate will find some unexpected presents waiting for them come daybreak.

act3collection_point_token.name: 'Strategist' Point
act3collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special reward points as an incentive to field operators contributing to Integrated Strategies operations. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act3collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.
act3collection_point_token.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

emoticon_originium_slug.name: Emote Set: Slug Style
emoticon_originium_slug.description: 'Stop pulling up the corners of your mouth into that stiff smile and try being more like an Originium slug. Open up your shell, spread out your soft parts, and... Believe me, do that, and you'll get over the awkwardness real quick.'
emoticon_originium_slug.usage: An emote set based on Originium slugs, used to communicate between partners.

act1multi_token_cap.name: Participation Certificate - S1
act1multi_token_cap.description: A certificate of participation in Rhodes Island's Icebreaker Games. 'Leave your sweat in the stadium. Come home with camaraderie.'
act1multi_token_cap.usage: As you collect Participation Certificates, so does Hype. Reach certain Hype levels to receive rewards.

act41side_token_light.name: Broken Originium Lamp
act41side_token_light.description: One tradition Tarans brought back is wearing an Originium lamp at their hips. Once, people would take them into the Dark Woods, but now those bodies have been scattered by the wind. Not even shadows are left, only shattered lamps.
act41side_token_light.usage: A damaged Originium lamp found in the Dark Woods. Once Na Saoirsí's supply issues were resolved, the citizens spontaneously decided to organize, taking out the only supplies they had on hand to recover these relics of the war.
act41side_token_light.obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward
